content.detailedDescription:
I want to start by saying that we also witnessed some of the flashing lights described in other report for 7/11/06 at sunset beach, but we did not consider these much because thought they must be military plane formations.

i (37 years old) was sitting on the porch at sunset beach looking to the west over the bay towards the mainland.  i was sitting with my husband, sister and 67 year old mother.  around 10:15 pm i looked straight up into the night sky and saw a red chevron shape floating directly above us, there were about 8 circular red "lights" glowing on the bottom of it.  i'm not sure about height but image at least 600 feet up, my husband says 1000+.  there was no sound and we watched the object for 2-3 minutes.  it swayed slightly in the air as we watched, so that i said it must be a kite.  everyone else said it was far too high up for that, plus it was clearly glowing bright red.  eventually the object swept north slightly, disappeared behind a cloud and was gone.

the strangest part of the experience happened next.  a glowing green orb, about the size of a tennis  ball, but more oval or cigar shaped dropped down from the height of our house and hit the water in front of us at the end of our pier.  instead of sinking, the object bounced off the water about 20 feet in the air and continued skimming and "bouncing" across the sound in a straight line.  we watched it for about 10 minutes bouncing through the salt marsh far to the west and we could see the light still as it appeared to rise up and pass over the treeline on the far horizon (a number of miles away).  we were completely confounded by this because we all saw the object clearly and could not imagine anything to explain it.  the object did not make any sound, glowed bright flourescent green, and traveled in a gentle but directed arcing motion bouncing all the way across the sound in the direction that the red chevron disappeared.

even if the red chevron could be explained by weather balloon or plane, cannot figure out about this green object.  we sat talking about it for hours because we had all seen the objects so clearly and were absolutely confounded by it.  we thought of going around to ask the neighbors if they saw it, but no one was out on their porches near us.  we have been thinking about it and discussing it since.  very very very strange.  none of us have ever had a similar experience before.
content.summary: Red chevron above our house in sky large and high up; green oval orb at eye level small, tennis ball size

content.detailedDescription:
I saw the objects again last night.
i was out with the night vision camcorder not seeing anything unusual earlier in the evening.
around 11:30pm i was just about to call it a night when i saw a bright streak come from the east move to the southwest. so i aimed the camcorder towards where i saw the object go.
5 mins later i saw it.
it was i'd say a mile from me just above the clouds and it pulsated 3 times than blinked out to nothing.
about 10 mins later another object streaked by moving in the same direction maybe the same object moving back to the original area.
i viewed it on video but it���s too hard to see.
these are the same objects i have been seeing now for over 8 weeks in this area.
these objects move so fast they look like shooting stars. they are moving at very high rate of speed to from one spot to another location in the blink of an eye almost like a sci-fi movie.
nothing could catch these objects we have on this planet.
so this is 4 nights in a row that i have seen these objects.
i wonder if anyone reading this in the boca, delray, palm beach areas are seeing these objects as well.
i don't think they show up on radar because i have not seen any military aircraft chasing them. the funny thing is it seems they can make themselves invisible by just turning off their light, without the light you would never know they were there.
i was tempted to try and signal them with a flashlight but i decided i didn't want to take a chance on inviting something that i may not like to see or experience so i'll just keep trying to catch them on film.

these craft are coming to this area for a reason and i don't know why.
i know others are seeing these objects here they are just not reporting them.
i'll just keep reporting what i see.
thanks jc
content.summary: Objects seen 4th night in a row over delray beach, florida

content.detailedDescription: I was wake looked out my back window and saw a red flash,fairly small but really traveled fast as it moved it turned silver and dissapeared. i wasn't sleeping so i went back, then i saw a very large golden light behind trees. it was huge. it stayed for about 1 hr then it was gone.I really wasn't upset just curious. my cats were awake but ok.The golden orb it you want to call it that. it was as if it was waiting on something,that was the feeling i got.
content.summary: Saw a red bleep as moving turned silver then a lg.Golden orb appeared  behind trees. then it was just gone

content.detailedDescription: It was about 10:55 p.M., i had just gone outside to have a cigarette. being an avid sky watcher, when i am smoking i am usually also looking up at the night sky, looking at the stars, watching the passing planes that land at spokane international airport, etc...  i usually see "shooting stars" and satelites in orbit passing overhead and think nothing of them.  what i say tonight (july 15, 2006) was a little out of the ordinary from what i normally see each night.  i was outside my house looking out towards the west, when almost directly above me i saw something that at first i thought was a satelite...But then i noticed that it was a little to close to the ground and moving a little to fast to be a satelite.  it looked like a row of lights, six or eight lights total, red in color and not too bright, heading due south.  it appeared that all of the lights were connected to one object--- the spaces in between the lights where blacking out the sky above the object as it passed overhead. it was going in straight line, keeping the same speed the entire time it was in my sight, no turns or sudden stops. i know it was not a landing plane as the flight path was wrong and the speed was to fast.  it took approx. 3 seconds for this object to come from behind me to completely out of site over the city to the south.  i have seen strange things in the sky before that i shrugged off as being something natural or man made, but this just felt different inside of me for some reason.  not sure if this something your organization would like to know about, and normally i wouldn't even bother reporting it, but what i saw just seemed a little out of place to me and my first thought after it dissapeared was to contact mufon and tell my story.  nothing exciting or ground breaking i know, but still seems like the right thing to do.
content.summary: Strange light in the western sky above spokane, wa lasting about 3 seconds

content.summary: Strange light in the western sky above spokane, wa lasting about 3 seconds

content.detailedDescription: I took this picture this morning and when looking at the original was about to delete it when i decided to enlarge it just in case. when enlarged it appears to be two distinct objects. i took the picture from the field in front of my house.
content.summary: Strange looking onject when enlarged was two objects

content.detailedDescription:
This is an update to sightings we reported last night in delray beach, florida.
here's a video of another unknown strange flying entity moving in as unusual pattern. it was shot looking to the east at 9:20pm
i've also included a still image capture of a very large semi-transparent sphere just in the sky where i had my camcorder aimed. i did not see this object with the naked eye but when i viewed my video footage today this is what i saw.
it���s a sphere and i have 15mins of footage of it.
it disappears and reappears a bunch of times in the video. sometimes just off in the blink of an eye and sometimes fades in and out and at one point it looks like it comes back in from the west to the same position.
this stuff is being shot with the sony dcr dvd-105 camcorder with super nightshot plus and it sees stuff that the eyes don't in the dark. (it���s amazing!)
this area is very active at the moment and hopefully i'll get some more great footage.
thanks jc
content.summary: Update to sightings on 7/14/2006 over delray beach florida

content.detailedDescription: My husband saw them in the sky on the way home from work
content.summary: Lights in the sky moving in strange ways

content.detailedDescription: I have been videotaping these black and shiny ufo's on several occasions,seemed every time i was outside filming i would see one of these .Well this time i caught the "fireball" type things aswell.Video is accompanying
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I was watching one.Then another travelled right by

content.detailedDescription:
This is an event i have always remembered.  i was reminded of it today while reading a report in the denver post on the ufo network symposium.  the article mentions ken storch, who while working for offutt afb new of 5 ufo's flying in formation.

i was a senior in high school in 1974 and did a lot of star gazing with a friend.  he had a 8 inch reflector telescope and we spent many hours at night looking at the stars.  we saw the five objects pass across the view in the telescope.

we were both amazed at how fast they were moving.  no plane could have moved that fast. i am a sky watcher and even the satelites were not moving that fast.   in fact we could not even follow the objects with the telescope.  we knew this was something out of the ordinary.  the formation was geese like with a lead, then two and then two in a arrow formation.

the objects went across the sky from one horizon to the next.  i do not remember the exact positon in the sky but it was almost directly overhead.  i am sure the afb just outside boston has the information.
content.summary: Five very fast moving objects flying in formation

content.detailedDescription: I was living at my grandparents at the time.It was around 8 or 9 pm and i wanted to watch t.V. but everyone in the house was already watching there own shows so i decided to head out side,so i grabbed up my radio and headed out side to the garage were we had a tv that was hooked to cable and a v.C.R..It was night out side and the stars were out which i noticed when i stepped outside,,but something caught my eye's and totally ignored going into the garage and kep walking until i was almost in the street but just kep looking up,,,all i saw was the incredable formation of red lights slightly to the right of are house about 200 yards away,,,i new yards well because i used to go to the shooting range with my dad,,,anyway's it was just sitting there in the night sky!!,just those red lights!!!,no noise  no nothing just sitting there!,,the formation almost looked like two circles slightly over lapping each other from the middle.I wanted to tell someone about this so i looked over to my friends house and seen him doing homework threw his huge front window,,,so i ran over and banged on his window and told him to come out for a look!! so he too came running out and ran right past me over to my house before i could and instantly started yelling at me that those red lights were going out one by one!!!! so i ran over and seen only two lights left,out of 24 lights! two were only left in the sky....Thay looked alot like head lights on a car except more spread apart,,,then all of a sudden thay came together and "hooked up" so now only one light was left!!!!...Then the light started blinking and it started slowly flying away from us until it was gone from are sights over the hill going towards the ocean,only to leave us wandering what it was!!!,people in san diego are used to seeing jets and blimps flying around making tons of noise!!! but what me and my friend saw that night was not that of a normal aircraft,but just after that i heard about what happened over the sky's over phoenix arizona!!!!,,,people say that it only happened there!! that's just totally not true,,it also happened over the sky's of  san diego too.......
content.summary: A formation of 24 red lights

content.detailedDescription:
This is the third time i have seen this same thing at this location. the last time i saw it, it was being persued by several fighter jets. no kidding! i reported it to you guys but have heard nothing back. this time it was alone. same as first time. my wife also saw it the first time. tonight it moved from the western horizon toward the northeast at probably a couple hundred miles per hour. it only took it a few minutes to pass completely out of sight. it made no sound. it left no vapor trail. the sky was crystal clear, with no wind. it had no marker lights. the atmosphere was heavy with moisture so there should have been a vapor trail. it was at less than 10,ooo feet so there should have been some kind of sound. i live way out in the country, and it is very quiet here. i should have been able to here something. i am a former paratrooper, so i am somewhat familiar with aircraft and such. i went outside to take a leak, and look for satilites, when i saw this bright light emerge from the western horizon. i watched it in silence, as it moved in a straight line, and passed out of sight into the northeastern sky. i did not know what to think. i don't know what the hell is going on, but i am really spooked! i sure wish i knew what this is! could someone write me back? thanks,
t.
content.summary: Bright light moving west to northeast, no sound, no vapor trail, no marker lights

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were standing outside at about ten twenty-five pm, letting our dog out for the last time before we went to bed.  we were standing in our driveway, looking north towards springfield, and  i noticed a very large bright light in the sky.  i have no idea how far away it was, because it seemed so large that it was hard to judge how far away it was.  it was lower than you would expect an aircraft, but the cell phone tower in the distance was at least three inches below it, relatively speaking.  i pointed it out to my husband and he said, "that has to be a tower or something, it's too bright for a plane."  however, the object slowly moved straight drown, and then seemed to 'float' back up again.  it did this for about three or four mintues, and we started to really get weirded out.  it had no defining shape because it was so bright, that the only thing we could see was the light it was emitting.  if i was holding and object in my hand, and trying to cover the entire thing up, it would have had to be pretty large...At least the size of a softball.

we stood there watching this thing, and my eyes actually started to hurt looking at it.  i would liken this to standing beneath a street light and staring straight into it.  my husband suddenly pointed to the west, and we saw a helicopter start circling this thing.  it completed two very wide circles around it, and then swung around again and started heading straight for it.  as it got closer, the bright object ascended slowly, and we suddenly heard  a very deep loud rumble, similiar to the sound of a large plane.  as the helicopter approached, the object began heading west, seemingly straight for the helicopter.  my husband said, "oh my god, they are going to hit eachother." because that's how close they were.  however, the helicopter passed underneath it, and when they were right next to eachother, the helicopter looked dwarfed.  the helicopter's light looked like a tiny pinpoint of light next to this object...So either, the helicopter was abnormally small, or this onject was huge and much farther away than we had orginally thought.  when the object passed the helicopter it sped up and just raced away to the northwest.  it was weird because before it had looked like a giant ball of light hovering, and suddenly all we could see were lights flashing in a very fast strobe like matter all along the bottom of it, which appeared to be completely flat and straight. this was no steady delayed light flashing, it was continously flashing one after another in the line so that it looked like the bottom of the obejct was actually rotating.

the helicopter swung back around and followed after it, and then we lost track of both of them.

i do not pretend to know what this thing was, but it was not something i have ever seen before.  i have never seen two aircraft pass by eachother in such a haphazard way, and i have never seen something so bright and large hover in such a manner.  i would like to call the radio station and ask if anyone else has reported seeing this, but i am a little afraid to do so.  i don't mind talking to an investigator, but i don't want my name to be used as a 'witnesss' in any public forum.  i just don't want people to think i'm crazy.

thanks,
emily weaver
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: We saw a large hovering object, very bright, then a helicopter circled it twice, and the object took off and they crossed very closely in the air, we thought they were going to collide.

content.detailedDescription:
I just had another sighting with three witnesses this time.
it was at 10:30 pm july 14, 2006 i had just stop filming two 20min sessions and was downloading the video i had captured and was sitting outside with my neighbor when he stop talking and said he just saw a shooting star go by.
no more than 1 mins later i also saw a streaking object come in from the east and go over the roof but it was high and looked like a shooting star.
we talked for another 2 mins and i got up and went to look at the sky and to my shock i saw a bright pulsating object to my west and it was moving to the northwest and i screamed look look finally someone else to see these objects i have been seeing.
my neighbor ran over and saw the object i told him don't take your eyes off of it and i ran inside the house to get the camcorder and the disk had not been done downloading so i yanked it out and formatted it as quickly as i could, my wife pam ran out to look as well and by the time i got out there and got the settings setup it was kind of faint but was still there.
i think i filmed it for 15 mins or so and it got farther away and was getting hard to see but it looked like a star for a long time.
i thought i saw a few objects at one point but was hard to tell and they were just below and a little west of the big dipper.
someone in vero beach or maybe even north of that had to see them.
i have not looked at the video yet but this area is active.
i have been seeing them for the past 8 weeks now and i wish some other people would come out and watch the skies in the boca, delray, and palm beach areas to confirm the objects that are appearing here.
i'm trying my best to catch them on digital video but it���s hard to predict where they will be or show up at. it���s a matter of chance to catch them on camera.
thanks jc
content.summary: Another sighting of pulsating objects in delray beach, florida

content.detailedDescription:
On tuesday night, july 11th, my brother, sister-n-law and fiance' were sitting on the porch overlooking the ocean looking southwest. i have always loved to stargaze and search for shooting stars and admire the night sky. i noticed a large, redish colored star and pointed to it about to ask everyone else what star they thought it was(it looked like mars but a bit bigger) but by the time the question left my mouth, it somewhat slowly disappeared. confused, i said "what the fuck was that?" convinced that is was not just a shimmering star or some sort of aircraft, i continued to look in that direction, thinking that it might re-appear. about 30 minutes later, in the same area of the sky above the ocean, a small light started to shine and slowly disappear again. "look, look, look, there it is again!" i said. melina and kristy turned around and missed it but my brother, sam, caught the light disappearing. i saw it happen about three more times that night with kristy and melina finally witnessing one of them. they all went to bed and on the last one of the evening i saw 2 lights. they never reappeared in the same spot but did stay in the general area. i came inside to get my other brother, michael, but by the time he and his friend came out to see it...It never showed up again. during this time, kristy and i also noticed some small "blinking" lights that flew around the sky as well. they did not seem like planes, since their patterns were not normal. their were 2 lights that traveled together and looked connected somehow. when the last ones we noticed flew away, i never saw the redish-orange light that appeared and reappear again that night.
the next night, around the same time, i decided to see if it showed up again and had them all come out and join me(so i would not think i was crazy). we saw it again. the first one was 2 lights. they were further apart than the night before and one turned on before the other one and faded before the other one faded too. my brother, michael, saw it this time. it happened a couple of more times that night and stopped before midnight. just like the night before. our first reactions were to *rule out" possibilities like, flares, satellites, etc., but could not make sense of any of our guesses.
the next night was the most active, again around the same time and always in the general area over the ocean. i first saw one light appear and reappear, then we saw 2 lights again, this time very clear. the night before they were a little faint. after about 10 minutes, i saw the clearest most interesting one(chills). one light appeared, then another, then another then another. all slowly turing on and off, making part of a shape(sort of a line). note that all of these lights, when gone, left no trace. they totally disappeared. beforer this most graphic one, i counted around 15 "little" lights like i mentioned before. the sky seemed filled with these tiny white blinking lights traveling in odd patterns...Then they all were gone. after a longer period of nothing, we noticed a couple of tiny ones return to the same area, gather and venture off in another direction. as they returned, my brother and i saw the bigger, darker light reappear in another part of the sky, near the area where we saw the majority of them. this time, we saw more than 2 lights again and then it reappeared a fair distance away, making it seem like it moved a long distance in a short amount of time. during these sightings, we never heard a noise. the lights were always a redish color. the last night we saw them, it seemed to go on a little later. the first couple of nights it ended around 11:30 or so. this night, it was almost midnight before we gave up.

i have seen a lot of things in my life but nothing like this. one of my brothers went to duke engineering school and my other brother lives in mcminnville, or and always plays the role of "devil's advocate". neither one of them could explain it. i don't know if there was a connection between the big light and the little traveling ones but their seemed to be...Each time our eyes noticed the little guys, the bigger one would show up...Almost like it was a *mother* ship to these little ones. regardless, i would be more skeptical if the light was always in the same spot or always remained *one* light but we saw one, two three and even four at different times and at different spots above the ocean. it made a pattern...Or so it seemed. i got chills after seeing the object, especially the 2 times it showed mutliple lights.

my account is described much better while discussing it. typing it out seems to lose some of the content i observed. i guess this whole experience could be explained as being *military operations* but for some reason, it feels different. there was not a consistency with them, like i mentioned. most of the lights seen were just *one* light appearing and disappearing...But to also see them multiply was odd. sometimes 2 lights and obviously the ones that had 3 to 4. flares? nope. weather balloon? i don't think so. helicopters? no. these lights looked and felt different. 

we went outside the last night to see them again(hopefully for the 4th night in a row) but it was very cloudy and nothing showed up. it was our last night at sunset beach. we, as a family, have been coming here since we were kids and watched the sky a lot, never seeing anything like this. if it were *military*, then i would think that we would have experienced these lights before but the nearest base is cherry point and it is in the opposite direction we were looking in. this was over the ocean.
content.summary: Appearing and reappearing lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Sorry the last mpg video was in the wrong format and had problems viewing so i have corrected it.
another discovery that i have made is i have captured the object frame by frame and when the object comes to a stop i have enlarged that frame in photoshop and it looks like a face in that object! kinda spooky.
another thing is the 2 small lightning looking straks coming from an object in the sky, now thats weird.
also note: the vertical line that you see is a 2 meter antenna mounted on the roof of my truck and is used as reference to show the camera is not moving.

i think the probe comes in to take either a look at me and my filming or is checking out the infrared light source.
just 14 mins later i see another pulsating object in the sky. i think this object and the weird lightning looking streaks have something to do with this ufo.
content.summary: Updated video of possible probe in mpg-1 format

content.detailedDescription: I was out side my house talking with my neighbors and it was late,we all noticed a large star like shape in the sky it was floating back and forth it was darting sapraticly in different directions.It then decended upon our house very quickly it was suddendly with out warning above my home floating there.It had many lights and a weird radiation was eminating from it it was very quiet it made no noise at all. it was there and every one could see it we tryed to call the news but none of our phones would work.The ship had what looked like pods of some kind on the botom of it.It realesed them and they abruptly fell on to my lawn them imediatly relesing some kind of light it was bright and cool then they dissapeared in a flash of light.My neighbors and i stood there in shock as it immediatly dissapered just as soon as it had came.
content.summary: Giant ufo ship hovering above my house

content.detailedDescription: While going to college of marin in the morning rush hour traffic heading south on hwy 101 coming over the hill to where i could see the marin county civic center i felt that the hwy next to it looked oddly wrong.  as i continued to drive in heavy traffic the hwy was replace by a prussian blue light which then changed to silver as i approached it.  this was wider than the whole hwy and about 10 ft above it  a huge traffic jam was piled up under the light as traffic slowed to a crawl.  as i got close i saw that it was a huge silver colored ufo directly over the hwy.  in front of the ufo was a screen on arms that probably came out from unde rhte ufo as the bottem  was rough on it not smooth.  the screen reflected the scene behind the ufo hiding it. but as i approached it the screen failed to hide it.  i drove under it expecting to get zapped to mars or something and was greatly occupied avoiding other cars whose drivers were in shock.  the thing was a vivid impression of contemptuous power  it was silent. only the screen showed any light.  i didnot notice and ring of vents on it.  thousands of people saw the thing going to work nothing at all was in the media about it.  about ten yearw later my sister and her children saw a similar object in the same spot  while driving on 101 a huge ufo came over the hill from san rafael and hovered over the hwy at the civic center  my sister pull off on a side road to watch it and she aher children were so close that as she said she could bounce a ball off it it made a low hummin noise.  no onw on the hwy seemed to see the ufo and she felt atht the people were dammend idiots as they buzzed under it  four military helicopeter come over the ill and chased the ufo around the area at low altitude while my sister watched.  finally the ufo took off towards the north with the helicopters after it.  my sister felt that she was the only one who noticed the event. later my nephew had a girl friend who lived in that area and she said that at night goblins used to come and take her out of the window and that she had to dance with them in the driveway.  she insisted that she was telling the truth and that the goblins were very scarey  i had nodoubts that the thing i saw was a ufo and my sister had no doubts about waht she saw.  i felt that is was clear indication of alin power but i was used to seeing thing slike that as a kid.  i lost sight of it driving over the hill trying to avoid other drivers in a panic state.  now a question was the ufo i saw there to pick up or deliver some one since it was at the civic center?  the screen was an attempt to hide the ufo from iew.  how many silver colored ufos were screens viewed at a wrong angle to hide thing.  the original scene went trhough a color change as i approached it which would seem to indicate that the screen is limited in its ability to hide things depending on the angle of the viewer  why was my ufo seen by thousands not in the media
content.summary: While driving to college in morning on hwy 101 by marin co. civic center a huge ufo was above the hwy at 10 feet altitude and was driven under by thousdands of commuters going into san francisco

content.detailedDescription: I was in thailand having fried grasshopper dipped in chocolate. and then the wings went in my nose and i started sneezing.So when i sneezed i looked up at the sky and there is was a boomerrang shaped flying object flaying really fast in an angle. and i thought i was high from the grasshopper then the object came down behind the trees of the park and i saw an alien come out of the ship looking at me. and sending messages to my head that i could not understand. then i blacked out.
content.summary: Chocolate grasshopper

content.detailedDescription: as a kid i lived near hamilton afb in calif.  on a summer day i and my friends larry and dennis heifner and steven laycock were playing on the tree covered hillside in front of my home. coming into a small clearing in a gully we found a landed ufo which greatly excited us  it was the same color of the dry summer grass and was circular shaped on a tripod landing gear it was about 50 ft in diamter  we carefully checked it out and no one was around we had bb guns which made us feel invincible we captured a  ufo.  a stair came down fron the center of thing with a spindly railingclimbing up i looked inside but all i could see was a greenish gray shinny wall dividing the thing in half the inside of the machine was dark and stick my head into the craft was not a real good idea at the time.  a ring of vents went around the thing and were set at a45 degree angle to the edge. viewed from the to the vents would rotate counter clock wise  looking into the vents i saw a hollow tube with a wieght on the end in the back of the vent.  the inside of the vent was dark like soot but it did nto rub off on my hand. the band of vents was about 30 inches in width.  a tail on the top of the thing ran from the top out to the edge then stopped  it was on the half blocked off by the wall  the hole thing was very strongly build and lookedvery heavy.  as we exsamined the thing we got worried that the owners would come back for it and then the war would be on.  it was a classical shaped ufo with a tail.  i had tiemto examine it and to touch and feel the stars literally.  we finally silently slipped back into the trees like indians leaving the craft to its owners  we noticed the thing immediately on entering the clearing and it was very obvious that it was a ufo   i was excited about it and i tried to learn as much as i could about it but none of us wanted to stick our head into the hatch where it was dark inc contrast to the bright sun out side.  it was shut off and did nothing as we examined it.  we last saw it as we left through the trees.  i touched the stars  we accepted it as normal in that we always saw wierd stuff and wierder critters.  it was part of life as a kid living next to an air base that you saw ufos and strange stuff.  that was because the bugs as i called them lived in an underground base in the hill which is a whole another thing to talk about.  why was the un founded in san francisco?
content.summary: While playing with friends on a hillside in the trees my friends and i found a ufo

content.detailedDescription:
Went outside to film with my camcorder around 9:10pm or so as a thunderstorm just cleared out 30 mins prior. 
i have been seeing pulsating objects for 8 weeks now so setup the camcorder on a tripod and pressed the record button.
the objects range from an orange to almost yellow color and compaired to a dim lightbulb.
i am using a sony dcr-dvd 105 handycam with super nightshot plus with infrared light. i didn���t see the this object with the naked eye but did see the pulsating ufo 14 mins later and also have that on dvd. 
after viewing the dvd i discovered this footage and here's my opinion. 
i think its a probe checking out the infrared light source and after in comes into the camera view and changes direction a couple of time up to the right there seems to be a tiny lightning looking bolt coming from an object in the sky. 
i think this is either a guide for the probe or a tractor beam for the probe or may actually be the ufo itself.
i may be wrong on my analysis but who knows at this point. 
it���s clearly not a bug or insect and the fact that i saw the ufo just 14 mins later tells me it had something to do with it. 
i'm including an mpg format video so you can see it more clearly.
content.summary: Possible probe and orange pulsating ufo video

i have been seeing pulsating objects for 8 weeks now so setup the camcorder on a tripod and pressed the record button.

content.summary: Possible probe and ufo

content.detailedDescription:
I am a 50 y/o retired paramedic who now designs and develops off road tactical equipment. almost weekly i am in the remote mountains of the arizona sonoran desert, field testing  new equipment.On the afternoon of 04/30/2006 at approx. 15:30 hrs. i was doing just that. i was in the process of taking reference photos of  equipment i had just tested. i noticed a jet at pretty high altitude with a large contrail passing overhead. i didn���t think much about it because  phoenix sky harbor 
airport was 4o-45 miles away. i was also aware that a major flight path in and out of sky harbor is in this area.  a few seconds after i noticed the jetliner  i happen to glance back up. a black object had appeared  between the jetliner���s contrail and looked to be following it. it remained behind the jetliner for approx. 30 seconds and then disappeared. i had my kodak z740 camera which has a pretty good zoom and was able to take a photo of it. 

i talked to a close friend who has been a capt. with one of the major airline carriers for over 25 years.After telling him what had occurred and showing him the photo, he had no clue has to what the object
was. i asked him about the possibility of being  two military aircraft getting ready to hook up for mid-air refueling. he said it wasn���t likely because this is in the area of a major flight path into of sky harbor called the buntr.
content.summary: Suddenly a black object appeared between the contrails of a jet airliner and appeared to be following it.

content.detailedDescription: i was in the back yard checking on my cat. i noticed the light to the west of my house. (note: this is the forth time i have seen this thing.) it is too bright to be a star or sattellite. it is a single orange light so, it isnt any kind of commercial vehicle. it seemed pretty motionless for a min or so. then began to slowly move south-west. i had to move to the front yard to continue watching it. it seemed to stop moving and began to flicker slowly. very dim to bright. it did this a few times and just looked like it shut itself off. leaving me feeling kind of creeped out. seeing this object a fourth time, has prompted me to make a report. i am pretty distressed. i want to know what this thing is.
content.summary: Bright orange star-like light over campbell

content.detailedDescription: Around 8pm , friends on a smoke break from work noticed 3 objects high up in the sky.  we got a video camera and have great footage of the them hoovering in formation for about 7mins.  included in our footage are detailed video one of the objects a perfect ring shape slowly spinning, and the 2nd object ( a diamond shape) also spinning , but not moving forward.  the objects made 2 formations a diagonal line shown in photo , and a 30 / 60/ 90 degree triangle.  they were video taped and seen with binoculars for 7mins until a passenger jet came into the area and then they vanished, if anyone out there will help us , we want our digital video tape to be analyzed ,
content.summary: 3 ufos  made 2 formation a diagonal line and a triangle, video taped them , looked like rings

content.detailedDescription: About 3:30-4:00a.M., on 6/21/06, i heard a low but powerful rumble. living near a small airport and in the flight path, it is not uncommon to hear small crafts fly by. my land lord and i have an ongoing game where we guess from the sound, what kind of plane is passing. after years of this we only guess or comment on unusual sounds i.E., military, goodyear blimp. rollo,a large pitbull, always gives away the blimp because he gets very upset and aggressive at it. i hear this rumble that i first thought was an earthquake,that's how low but powerful it was. when i noticed no shaking, i said to myself, "what the hell kind of jet is this?". i ran out the back door to see what direction it was coming from, turned out to be coming from the south and getting louder. there was a low and light cloud cover and just above it i see lights coming fast! as it passed overhead i see 14 to 16 lights that outlined the craft. i could see no color. whatever it was, i mean it was moving! rollo and i watched it pass. i called bob's name,i don't know why, there was no way he could have made it outside to see, but he did hear me. after it passed i looked at rollo and he looked at me as if he were looking for some kind of clue on how he should react. i remaind calm but was really impressed by the speed. i tried to tell myself that it must have been some kind of stealth or something. it was then that i reallized, "wait, the craft was long gone and as it passed over, i heard no sound from it. i could still hear the rumble coming from the south so i kept watching to see if someone was giving chase. the rumble just faded and never came any closer. my first imprssion was...It just felt like an e.T. sight seeing tour bus. as time went on, it kept bugging me, i looked for answers. as far as i know, if it had lights at all, a stealth would be triangle not diamond. i tried to guess the size but had nothing to compare it to. we can also see 747s going in and out of lax. so the next one that came along gave me a better idea of the size of the diamond. even though it was much lower than the jets, it had to be at least two to three times the size of a 747. i'm not to knowledgeable about our military craft but it seems to me that 2-3 times lager than a 747 takes the stealth out of the picture. i have seen several u.F.O.S over the years from late '60s to present. from small balls of light bouncing to a craft that was as big a city. but this is the first i've wittnessed an event alone, w/ the exception of rollo. and this is also the first time i've ever reported one. i really wanted to call the police dept. or something, but i just kept feeling that chance are no one else saw it. because of the time of morning and the speed it was going, what are the chances that someone else saw it too.
content.summary: Went out back to investigate low rumble/one of the dogs followed/we both looked up to see a large diamond shoot by.
